resources.string: When we step forward together, we can make a world of difference.
When we step forward together, we can make a world of difference. Join tens of thousands of Canadians who are fighting global poverty and inspiring hope.

Funds raised through World Partnership Walk go directly to support AKFC’s development programs in Africa and Asia— initiatives that improve access to quality education and health, increase food security, create economic opportunities and help millions of people unlock their potential to build a better life.
